# RDPipelineColorBlendState

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Pipeline color blend state (used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md)).

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md).

<a id="class_RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_enable_logic_op"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_logic_op**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_enable_logic_op**\ (\ )

<a id="class_RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_logic_op"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[LogicOperation](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_LogicOperation) **logic_op** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_logic_op)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_logic_op**\ (\ value\: [LogicOperation](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_LogicOperation)\ )
- [LogicOperation](class_renderingdevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_LogicOperation) **get_logic_op**\ (\ )

The logic operation to perform for blending. Only effective if [enable_logic_op](class_rdpipelinecolorblendstate.md#class_RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_enable_logic_op) is ``true``.
